= Small problems =
== RGB-color generating ==
How I generate RGB-colors, so they are not all approx [0.5 , 0.5 , 0.5]?

First version:
{{{
void getColors(float *red, float *green, float *blue){
int r=rand ();
int g=rand ();
int b=rand ();

*red=(r+0.0)/RAND_MAX;
*green=(g+0.0)/RAND_MAX;
*blue=(b+0.0)/RAND_MAX;
}
}}}


Second version: (little test-tweaking)
{{{
void getColors(float *red, float *green, float *blue){
int r=rand ();
int g=rand ();
int b=rand ();

*red=(r+0.0)/RAND_MAX;
*green=(g+0.0)/RAND_MAX;
*blue = *red+*green;
if (*blue >1.0)
   *blue=*blue-1.0;
}
}}}
